Frequently Asked Questions

  1. Why did you write Yet Another Copy Plugin?
Why did you write Yet Another Copy Plugin?

I needed to concatenate some overriding settings to a configuration file, to make a version suitable for automated tests. I could find no plugin that would do this. While I was at it, I threw in interpolation of property values since it sounded handy.
